message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product at a special price. I think you'll find it's a great value.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can meet you halfway. However, I'm willing to come down to $16,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $14,000?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle. I'm willing to come down to $17,000, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers. Would you consider $15,500?
